title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
Walt Disney Co. released three of its last four Pixar Animation Studios movies on its Disney+ streaming service without theatrical release. In some editions Thursday, a Business & Finance article about Netflix Inc. incorrectly said that Pixar's last three films didn't have theatrical releases.

---

Readers can alert The Wall Street Journal to any errors in news articles by e-mailing wsjcontact@wsj.com or by calling 888-410-2667.
